thread.title: Photos: Kapoors party at wedding in Abu Dhabi
thread.title_full: Photos: Kapoors party at wedding in Abu Dhabi

title: Photos: Kapoors party at wedding in Abu Dhabi
text: (Picture via Instagram) Pictures posted by Sonum Kapoor on Instagram gives a glimpse of the celebration The UAE has always been famous with Bollywood stars. They can often be spotted holidaying and celebrating their special days here. Recently, the whole of the Kapoor family has thronged to Abu Dhabi to celebrate a wedding at Emirates Palace. According to the reports, the Kapoor family was here to attend the wedding of Anil Kapoor's nephew Akshay Marwaah. Brother of Mohit Marwaah, Akshay is the son of Anil Kapoor's sister. He married Aashika Relan. All close cousins of the groom and relatives of the Kapoor family had got together to attend the wedding. Sonam Kapoor and Arjun Kapoor were also part of the celebration. Pictures posted by Sonum Kapoor on Instagram gives a glimpse of the celebration. A post shared by sonamkapoor (@sonamkapoor) on Feb 26, 2017 at 6:21am PST A post shared by sonamkapoor (@sonamkapoor) on Feb 26, 2017 at 6:17am PST A post shared by sonamkapoor (@sonamkapoor) on Feb 26, 2017 at 6:12am PST A post shared by sonamkapoor (@sonamkapoor) on Feb 26, 2017 at 6:06am PST A post shared by sonamkapoor (@sonamkapoor) on Feb 26, 2017 at 5:51am PST Feb 27, 2017 at 5:10am PST A post shared by Sridevi Kapoor (@sridevi.kapoor) on Feb 26, 2017 at 10:30am PST A post shared by Maheep Kapoor (@maheepkapoor) on Feb 26, 2017 at 6:37am PST Share
